review_data.title: Great experience, tasty good

review_data.title: Worth every cent

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: I went there now a few times. Food excellent snd authentic Indian. Service is very well and forthcoming. I don’t know why there are bad reviews but I can’t share that with them. It’s been great and I will come again.

review_data.title: Good Indian cusine
review_data.content: This one of the good Indian food we had during this Europe trip.Even though the usual Indian dinner menu, aloo sub I was good. Service was excellent

review_data.title: Fantastic taste and quality
review_data.content: A well managed hotel serving good authentic Indian food with lovely service. Good choice of dishes are available

review_data.title: Ok Indian food

review_data.title: Avoid at all cost

review_data.title: Tasty food
review_data.content: One of the few spacious Indian restaurants in Switzerland. Should be a good choice for a big group. And the cuisine is just terrific. The chicken is so tender and tasty, that it would possibly beat any restaurant in India. Truly, flavors of India.

review_data.title: Europe Trip
review_data.content: A nice restaurant for Indian food both veg and non veg, the taste was good and its a pleasure to see Indian restaurant in foreign land. Nice place to dine in heart of Switzerland

review_data.title: Nice Indian hotel
review_data.content: We had dinner in this hotel, they provide nice northindian dishes. Curd is excellent. Ambience is good.

review_data.title: Nice place
review_data.content: Been there multiple times during my three visits to Switzerland and good restaurant. They serve Indian food and are probably the only one in Kloten who do so. Food is pretty good by swiss standards. I had the curries and breads.

review_data.title: Nice Indian restaurant
review_data.content: The restaurant provides all options which any Indian will imagine for. The ambience was very good and also the service was quite fast. The only issue was they will not accept cards and also charges for tap water which in my view is not reasonable.

review_data.title: Sehr schnell unf gut zubereitete Indische Speisen
review_data.content: Authentisch und sehr qualitativ hochstehend zubereitete Speisen, welche mit Liebe zum Detail auch präsentiert werden.

review_data.title: Excellent Flavour

review_data.title: Awesome food and hospitality
